snippet: John Mayer needed to sell only 65,000 copies to hold onto the top slot, the smallest number for a No. 1 album since Feb. 2011.
abstract: John Mayer needed to sell only 65,000 copies to hold onto the top slot, the smallest number for a No. 1 album since Feb. 2011.

headline.main: Another Week for Mayer at Top of Charts
headline.print_headline: Mayer Keeps Top Spot On Album Chart
